channel.title: [317 specific item is always kept on death?
channel.description: For some reason, I just recently added some custom items, and if the player dies while skulled in PvP they lose all their items EXCEPT this specific item. And if their not skulled they'll keep 4 items + these items. So these items dont protect over anything, they just dont drop when the player dies. How can I fix this?
